mn59:1.3: Pañcakaṅga features as a prominent devotee of the Buddha in [mn78](), [mn127](), and in a parallel to the current sutta at [sn36.19](). As _thapati_ (“master builder”) he was a ranking official under Pasenadi, adept in the practical and ritual significance of architecture. | There are several individuals called Udāyī, and it is not possible to distinguish them all.
